name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Operations Engineer with 13+ years of experience in cloud services, proficient in **Azure**, **Linux**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**. Highly skilled in maintaining high service level agreements (SLAs) and documentation processes while driving collaborative problem-solving initiatives within cross-functional teams. Experienced in developing high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries, with technical expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Proficient in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and automation, leveraging **AWS** and implementing microservices architectures alongside CI/CD pipelines. Strong background in compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, coupled with solid MLOps experience using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
